text:
They will provide a deadline for fees payment but won’t provide a refund in a timely manner.

I’ve been registering students for exams regularly but this time around it seems like they are trying to fit all F2F students into one day.

If that is the case, why’d you promote it as “End of xx to Early xx”?

I appreciate the work they have done all these years but unfortunately will be turning to other exam centres from now.

Still waiting on a reply, let alone a refund.
